title: issue_history v2: Implement SLA timer calculation + lifecycle events

sections.text: Add SLA timer support to issue_history v2 by recording SLA lifecycle events (start, pause, resume, stop) tied to issue state/ownership transitions and key triage milestones. Implement backend logic to compute elapsed SLA time and current SLA status from the event stream, including handling reassignment and reopen scenarios. Expose the computed fields via API so downstream UI/reporting can display time-to-triage/time-to-resolution consistently.
